full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` TSE THAR GTONG TSUL DANG BCAS DBANG PO RNAMS RTEN DANG SPYAN GZIGS GO MTSON GSER SKYEMS DANG GTOR MA BLO PHYIN NANG MCHOD PA 'BUL BA'I NGO MTSAR BRGYAS KYI 'PHRENG BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES GA-YANG DVA SGO ZHI'I TSE THAR GTONG TSUL DANG BCAS PA DBANG PO RNAMS LA 'BUL BA'I NGO MTSAR CAN GYI 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA 'DI NI, SNGAGS 'CHANG NOR PA KHO CHA'I THOD DPER GYI RGYAL KHAMS SU SBYAR BA'I YIG CHA DANG BLA MA DAG SGRUN PA'I MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA GNYIS LA GZHIR BYAS, KHA BSKONG DKOR RNAMS KYI KHA BSGANG NAS LEGS PA'I DON CHA THAMS CAD PHYOGS GCIG TU BYAS NAS, GZHAN PHAN GYIS BSAM NAS BSGRIGS PA DAG ZHING BKRA SHIS 'BYON KYANG BOR SOGS KYIS CHD PA'I NGAG TU TSE THAR RNAMS TSE'I SGO NAS, LHA 'DI LTA BU BTZAN ZER BA DANG, YIG CHA RNAMS BAN LUGS SU DAR GDUGS MI THAD PA'I AU RGYAN PADMA'I GSUNGS SO, ,)
